channel.title: Is this right?
channel.description: Ok, at school yesterday me and my friend were just playing about insulting each other he said my dad was a lesbian so i said 'at least I have a dad!' And which at this point i didn't know that my friend's dad wasn't acctually alive... I get to school today and it turns out I've been suspended for it, WTF ?! Does anyone else here think that this has been an incorrect punishment? :D

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

Tell him your going to slit his throat I just got done serving my suspension for yelling fuck this

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“ninja nub, post:22, topic:207210”][quote author=ThAt0n36Uy link=topic=273120.msg2236157#msg2236157 date=1211421195]

My friend got suspended today because my teacher said “Get out of class, go to Mrs. Mark,” And he said “If I go out, I’ll pull a Virginia Tech on this bitch!”. Lol it was funny.

Wow you’re a lying sack of shit. That might’ve been funny in your little fucked up mind, but it wasn’t to the rest of us. GTFO.

As for what you said to your friend, eczema, do as Tico said. All it really takes is an explanation of your side of the story. Before you do, go speak with your friend. I’m sure it would help him to know you’re sorry for what you said.
[/quote]

You look at every single post I make and find a way to flame me. You should go, we don’t need people like you.[/quote]

No he is correct,your dumb and annoying ninja.So correction,we don’t need people like you.Honestly your worst than Greeny.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Tarantula:

Also your friend should be suspended if they did suspend you.

As is usual, when someone tells a tale on you, it’s pretty obvious they will only tell it THEIR way, they will not tell it entirely how it happened because quite frankly. It would sink them in the shit.

Uriko:

What gives him the right to make fun of your dad? For all he knows yours could be dead too.

No one has any rights to rip anyone for no reason, it’s just the way some people are. Also it proves how much of a cunt his " friend " is if he can say something about his father, then not recieve the same treatment.

My friend got suspended today because my teacher said “Get out of class, go to Mrs. Mark,” And he said “If I go out, I’ll pull a Virginia Tech on this bitch!”. Lol it was funny.

Wow you’re a lying sack of shit. That might’ve been funny in your little fucked up mind, but it wasn’t to the rest of us. GTFO.

As for what you said to your friend, eczema, do as Tico said. All it really takes is an explanation of your side of the story. Before you do, go speak with your friend. I’m sure it would help him to know you’re sorry for what you said.

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

So after I got a bit of singing in there:

When I went to high school they usually had the method of, Isolation until the end of the day > Formal report slip gave to the behaviour administration and to your parents upon collection. They did this one or / two days ahead of the exclusion.

I believe you should have been informed of the exclusion, by means of the school administration ringing your parent or gaurdian and telling them of the situation.

Read full topic

I like big butts and I can not lie

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

nohope:

Beat him up if you feel the need to vent any anger. But he insulted your alive dad. I don’t know but I think that’s worse because every time you see your dad now you’l remember what he said.

I really don’t understand why you bothered to post.

Anyways, what I would do is probably go to the guidance counselor or whoever deals with things such as suspensions. Your main goal here is to explain to he/she what really happened, and try to get her to understand your side of the story. If this person is really going to be so offended by this when you had no idea, then going to the school about it wasn’t very mature either. If he really was your friend, he would’ve talked to you about, and you would probably apologize.

Like Daviddude said, how can they suspend you without discussing things like this with you? If they think they can, that’s a lot of bullshit. A school should not be able to punish someone until both sides of the story has been heard. This is true in some schools, sometimes mine, but not all.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

If you were bullying him because he didn’t have a dad, then it would of been right for you to get suspended, but if he’s you’re friend, why would he tell a teacher ? Tbh, chill for a a few days, and just have a quiet word and say you’re sorry, and you didn’t realize, and i’m sure he won’t be that bothered.

Read full topic

Ok, at school yesterday me and my friend were just playing about insulting each other he said my dad was a lesbian so i said ‘at least I have a dad!’ And which at this point i didn’t know that my friend’s dad wasn’t acctually alive… I get to school today and it turns out I’ve been suspended for it, WTF ?! Does anyone else here think that this has been an incorrect punishment?

if your from america, then yes, it’s unfair, their stupid get your dad or mum to smack the head teacher then smack your friend for telling on you, what a little bitch <3

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

He probably got to school today was called down and was told. It depends if he was really your friend and if you were really just messing around. I know a kid who was suspended for 9 days because he was joking around and said “Don’t blame me if the school blows up.” So be careful what you say before you say it. Also I would recommend going and talking to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this right?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

To be honest I think its a bit stupid. If you explain what actually happened to the school then they should stop the suspension. All the school probably heard was “That kid made fun of my dead dad”.

You have to be careful with whom you are saying that sort of stuff to, even if you think you are just messing around. I don’t have a dad and I wouldn’t care at all if someone decided to joke around with that.

Read full topic
